thread.title: Scott
thread.title_full: SelectQuote Auto & Home reviewed by Scott

author: Scott
title: Scott
text: We already worked with SelectQuote: for Life Insurance with a great experience. After years of dragging our feet to look into Home, Auto, and Umbrella Insurance, we finally called SelectQuote: again and we are saving over $600/year. I wish we would have done this years ago!
